name: BACKUP (ErroneousCreationist)
description:
Welcome, subject, to the Inertia Laboratories Human Intellectual Testing Program, or the Testing Initiative, for short. Please proceed...

Navigate the test chambers of Inertia Laboratories, using the Localised Temporal Retrieval Device to aid! Please note that this game is in development, and there are some bugs and stuff. Cheers!

Controls: Q to save, E to load, WASD to move, click on cubes to pick them up,  click on buttons to press them, and G to drop picked up stuff. whew.

note: more levels may be coming soon. Trailer is also coming soon
